org.apache.streams.elasticsearch

Class ElasticsearchPersistWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.streams.elasticsearch.ElasticsearchPersistWriter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, StreamsOperation, StreamsPersistWriter
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ElasticsearchPersistDeleter, ElasticsearchPersistUpdater

    public class ElasticsearchPersistWriter
extends Object
implements StreamsPersistWriter, Serializable
    ElasticsearchPersistUpdater updates documents to elasticsearch.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
